text:
A Dangerous Proposition

Dimly lit room, tension crackles.  
Dounia grips a revolver, defiant.  
Svidrigaïlov: “You spoke of outrage, Avdotya.”  

Svidrigaïlov: “I’m stronger. You can’t complain.”  
Dounia: “Scoundrel!”  

Svidrigaïlov: “Violence is hateful, yet...”  
Dounia: “My family’s fate is in my hands.”  

---  

Dounia lays the revolver on the table.  
Svidrigaïlov jumps up, surprised.  
Svidrigaïlov: “Aha! So that’s it, is it?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia confronts Svidrigaïlov about his threats, revealing her own readiness to defend herself with a revolver.
